name: Death House of Zombies - A Virus Infected Police Officer At Cemetery
name_original: Death House of Zombies - A Virus Infected Police Officer At Cemetery
description:
Use your sharpshooting skills to save the innocent civilians

Become a saviour of the people by saving them from the undead approaching to kill. Use you shooting skills to take down all the zombies moving towards the civilians or hurting the civilians before they are killed by undead.

High precision and strategic targeting is required like a true sniper shooter to kill the zombies before any of the civilian is killed by them.

Can the human be protected by you before they get killed?

Game features are:

- Beautiful and attractive graphics
- 2 Different locations for shootings
- Multiple waves in each location
- Multiple snipers for the missions
- And much more.

Like the game share with others. Let us know your thoughts and provide us with your value able feedback.
